summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4315 for the improvement of the alley in Block 6, Denny-Fuhrman Addition, being the alley between Franklin Avenue and Boylston Avenue North, from Roanoke Street to Edgar Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 51174, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
